actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit federally-insured banks for making loans to provide for the purchase of bank stock.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit federally-insured banks from making any loan, discount or extension of credit to provide for the purchase of stocks, bonds, debentures, or other obligations of any bank.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit federally-insured banks for making loans to provide for the purchase of bank stock.
